title: Add Google Ads tracking tag to website

requirements.summary: Add Google Ads tracking tag (gtag.js) to the website's HTML <head> section for conversion tracking with ID AW-17968689708
acceptanceCriteria: The Google Ads tracking script is present in frontend/index.html within the <head> section
The script includes the async gtag.js loader with ID AW-17968689708
The dataLayer initialization and gtag config code is included
The tracking code loads on all pages of the website
The script is placed before the closing </head> tag to ensure proper initialization timing

file_operations.description: Insert the Google Ads tracking tag script block in the <head> section before the closing </head> tag. Add the async gtag.js loader script (https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=AW-17968689708) followed by the inline initialization script that sets up dataLayer, defines the gtag function, and configures tracking with the conversion ID AW-17968689708. Preserve all existing meta tags including the Google Search Console verification tag, SEO meta tags, and font preloading links.
